channel.title: Trade NPC Problems
channel.description:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -118 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16261) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15246) at client.process(client.java:15216) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45)
Everything is how it is supposed to be, wanneshop #'s are the same on the NPCs. I dont know , everytime i trade one of em, Lags and cuts me off. PLZ HELP PLOX

item.title: Trade NPC Problems

item.description:

I really do not know because there is nothing wrong with either of those. Let me think for am inute.

Horvik is messed up. There is a bug with Horvik. Try using a different NPC.
